info.author: Mass Open Cloud Contributors
info.description:
HIL is a low-level tool for reserving physical machines and connecting
them via isolated networks. It does not prescribe a particular
method for imaging/managing said machines, allowing the user to use
any solution of their choosing.
info.name: hil
info.summary: Hardware Isolation Layer: an automated network isolation layer for the data center
info.html_description: HIL is a low-level tool for reserving physical machines and connecting them via isolated networks. It does not prescribe a particular method for imaging/managing said machines, allowing the user to use any solution of their choosing.
